Export.Routine:
VARBRTipoArqUpload
;======================================================================== ; ; RETORNA TODAS AS EXTENSÃ•ES CADASTRADAS NUMA UNICA STRING, ; SEPARADA POR ~ ; ;======================================================================== GetExtensao(YM) &sql(DECLARE CURSORC CURSOR FOR SELECT DISTINCT lower(Extensao) INTO :cExt FROM SQLUser.VARBRTipoArqUpload WHERE Company = :YM )
&sql(OPEN CURSORC) quit:SQLCODE'=0 ""
&sql(FETCH CURSORC) quit:SQLCODE'=0 ""
set retorno = cExt
&sql(FETCH CURSORC) while(SQLCODE = 0) { set retorno = retorno _ "~" _ cExt &sql(FETCH CURSORC) }
&sql(CLOSE CURSORC) quit retorno
